title: This Month's GTA+ Benefits
headline: This Month's GTA+ Benefits
subtitle: GTA+
content:
In addition to the recurring monthly GTA$500,000 deposited directly into your Maze Bank account, GTA+ Members who've signed up for this month (March 4 - April 2) will also receive:

— The new Invetero Coquette D5 (Sports)
— 30% off the new McKenzie Field Hangar
— 2X GTA$ and RP on Air Freight Cargo Sell Missions
— Blue Two-Tone Denim attire
— And more

Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel anytime. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
